dmca.title: Software DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
The UI layout design, control design, and
 
all items in "Ninja Dash", including floating platform, obstacles, and  
bonus items, help message, i.e. "Touchable Area", "Jump", "Slide" in the  
left and right corner are exactly copy of "iRunner". We strongly ask
google  
to remove this app, and will sue "Mouse Games" soon.
